title: Miscellaneous Paintings and Calligraphy for the Third Year of the Bunsei Era
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
dimensions:
Image: 31 3/8 x 23 3/8 in. (79.7 x 59.4 cm)
Overall with mounting: 64 5/8 x 25 3/4 in. (164.1 x 65.4 cm)
Overall with knobs: 64 5/8 x 28 1/8 in. (164.1 x 71.4 cm)
creditLine: The Harry G. C. Packard Collection of Asian Art, Gift of Harry G. C. Packard, and Purchase, Fletcher, Rogers, Harris Brisbane Dick, and Louis V. Bell Funds, Joseph Pulitzer Bequest, and The Annenberg Fund Inc. Gift, 1975
repository: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY
